traits.name: Regeneration
entries: As long as the pledgemage has at least 1 hit point remaining, the pledgemage regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn.

traits.name: Verdant Talisman
entries: At the end of a 10-minute ritual, the pledgemage can touch one willing creature (including itself) and bestow upon it a small talisman imbued with magic. Upon receiving the talisman, the creature gains 10 temporary hit points, and it can add {@dice 1d6} to its initiative rolls while it wears the talisman. These benefits last for 1 hour or until the pledgemage conducts another ritual to bestow another talisman. When the benefits expire, the talisman crumbles to dust.

actions.name: Briar Vine
entries: {@atk ms} +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8 damage) poison damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the apprentice can pull it up to 10 feet closer to itself.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The apprentice casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
